text: Young Catherine is a 1991 TV mini-series based on the early life of Catherine II of Russia and was directed by Michael Anderson. It stars Vanessa Redgrave, Julia Ormond, Christopher Plummer, Franco Nero, Maximilian Schell, Mark Frankel, Reece Dinsdale, Anna Kanakis, Katharine Schlesinger. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 British television series debuts Category:1991 television series endings Category:Movies directed by Michael Anderson
title: Young Catherine
